image_description.overall_scene: A breathtaking mountainous landscape with a village nestled in the valley, featuring blue-roofed houses, prayer flags, and a runway on a hilltop, set against snow-capped peaks under a clear sky.

elements.name: Snow-capped mountains
elements.details: Towering peaks with sharp ridges, partially covered in snow, illuminated by warm sunlight.

elements.name: Village
elements.color: Blue roofs, gray stone walls, earthy brown paths
elements.details: Cluster of houses with vibrant blue metal roofs, stone-built structures, and narrow dirt or stone pathways winding through them.

elements.name: Runway
elements.details: Long, straight runway with visible white lines, surrounded by green-brown terrain.

elements.name: Prayer flags
elements.details: Strings of traditional Tibetan prayer flags fluttering in the wind, attached to poles near the village.

elements.name: Sky
elements.color: Clear blue with soft gradient to pale orange near horizon
elements.details: Wide expanse of clear sky with a few small birds flying, transitioning to a warm glow near the mountain peaks.

elements.name: Valley river
elements.details: Winding river cutting through the valley, bordered by green vegetation and rocky banks.

accessibility_notes.layout: Top to bottom: Sky → Mountains → Runway → Village → Prayer flags → River
accessibility_notes.spatial_relations: The village is below the runway, which sits on a hill; prayer flags frame the scene on both sides; the river flows along the right edge of the valley.
